title: Time stopped in Pixel 2 phone
content:
Today have got some carrier service updates at 7:53AM and I had updated some of the apps from Play Store through WiFi.
Left the phone in idle and went out.

After sometime found that the time in the phone stopped at previous time. I can Attach a screenshot. Not sure what happened but just verified the settings and there is no change. 
The clock on the phone notification bar stopped at the same time when I had kept the updates.

I think, Google is the only one who can stop the time.
